description: The archive and local studies centre at Valence House is a modern building housing the Borough of Barking and Dagenham's archive. It sits on the same site as Valence House Museum, a medieval moated manor house.

events.name: Archive of the Becontree Estate
events.notes: A selection of archive material relating to life on the Becontree Estate will be on display in the archive reading room. Everyone is welcome and we especially encourage local residents past and present to leave their thoughts and memories of life on the estate in relation to the material on display.

facilities: Photography is not permitted on site

factsheet.heading: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham Archives
paragraphs: The local archive service cares for and actively collects all records relating to the history of Barking and Dagenham. Records date from the 16th century to the modern day and include a large amount of material about the surrounding Becontree Estate.

images.title: Photograph of Becontree Avenue, Dagenham, showing dual carriageway taken from up poplar tree opposite LCS Stores, 1957

location.address: Valence House, Becontree Avenue, Dagenham, RM8 3HT

name: Becontree Estate: Archive
